isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Refrigerator Wiring W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Refrigerator Wiring W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: When the Master ON/OFF Switch of the sleeper is in the position (closed), power flows from B1 battery stud through circuits 14K, 14R, fusible link (2 - Blue 12GA), and circuit 14S to energize the sleeper magnetic switch. The ground path from the magnetic switch is circuit 11V, master ON/OFF switch, and circuit 11W to sleeper box ground stud.

With the sleeper magnetic switch energized, power flows from the magnetic switch through circuit 14V, fuse N1, and circuit 14W to the refrigerator. The ground path for the refrigerator is circuit 11E to the sleeper box ground stud.
